dwcaExtension.name: DWCA extension
dwcaExtension.count: {num, plural, one { DWCA extension } other {# DWCA extensions}}
dwcaExtension.description: A short description of the component should be placed here

locationId.name: Location ID
locationId.count: {num, plural, one { Location ID } other {# Location IDs}}
locationId.description: Publishers can choose to assign IDs to the location. This field is not normalized, meaning that you search data as provided by the publisher.

hasGeospatialIssues.name: Has geospatial issues
hasGeospatialIssues.description: Whether the record has geospatial issues.

collectionKey.name: Collection
collectionKey.description: The collection in GrSciColl this record was matched to

taxonomicStatus.name: Status
taxonomicStatus.description: The number of held specimens stated in the description. This number does not reflect how many records have been digitized and shared.

taxonRank.name: Rank
taxonRank.description: The number of held specimens stated in the description. This number does not reflect how many records have been digitized and shared.

numberSpecimens.name: Number of specimens
numberSpecimens.count: {num, plural, one { specimen count } other {# Specimen counts filters}}
numberSpecimens.description: The number of held specimens stated in the description. This number does not reflect how many records have been digitized and shared.

specimensInGbif.name: Specimens in GBIF
specimensInGbif.count: {num, plural, one { GBIF specimen count } other {# specimens in GBIF}}
specimensInGbif.description: Number of specimen records published on GBIF and linked to the institution entry.

iucnRedListCategory.name: IUCN Global Red List Category
iucnRedListCategory.count: {num, plural, one { IUCN Global Red List category } other {# IUCN Global Red List categories}}
iucnRedListCategory.description: The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species groups taxa by how threatened they are.

geoDistance.name: Distance from coordinates
geoDistance.description: Filter on records within a given distance from a point

geometry.name: Location
geometry.description: Filter on records within a given geometric area. The area can be a point, a line, a polygon, or a bounding box.

relevance.name: Relevance
relevance.count: {num, plural, one { relevance } other {# relevance filters}}
relevance.description: How is GBIF used in the literature.

topics.name: Topic
topics.description: What are the topics of the record.

audiences.name: Audience
audiences.description: Who are the audiences for the resource.

purposes.name: Topic
purposes.description: What are the purposes of the resource.

eventDate.name: Event date
eventDate.count: {num, plural, one {# event date } other {# event dates}}
eventDate.description: When was the record collected or observed.

alternativeCode.name: Alternative code
alternativeCode.count: {num, plural, one {# alternative code } other {# alternative codes}}
alternativeCode.description: Any additional code that is already in use for the same record in other contexts (for example, historical codes).

identifier.name: Identifier
identifier.description: A short description of the component should be placed here

discipline.name: Discipline
discipline.description: The research disciplines supported by the institution.

collectionContentType.name: Content type
collectionContentType.count: {num, plural, one {# content type } other {# content types}}
collectionContentType.description: The type of objects available in the collection

preservationType.name: Preservation type
preservationType.count: {num, plural, one {# preservation type } other {# preservation types}}
preservationType.description: The method used to preserve the objects available in the collection

taxonKey.name: Scientific name
taxonKey.count: {num, plural, one {scientific name} other {# scientific names}}
taxonKey.description: The scientific name as it appears in the GBIF backbone taxonomy. These names are normalized to ease search across datasets. It is possible that an originally-provided name might be misinterpreted or unknown. To search the names as provided use the "Verbatim scientific name" filter.

taxonKeyGrSciColl.name: Scientific name
taxonKeyGrSciColl.count: {num, plural, one {scientific name} other {# scientific names}}
taxonKeyGrSciColl.description: Filter using the scientific names listed in the collection descriptors provided in the collection's metadata, noting that not all collections include metadata descriptors and the names are often at higher taxonomic ranks such as order or family.

basisOfRecord.name: Basis of record
basisOfRecord.count: {num, plural, one {basis of record} other {# bases of records}}
basisOfRecord.description: The nature of the evidence upon which the record is based.

institutionCode.name: Institution code
institutionCode.count: {num, plural, one {institution code} other {# institution codes}}
institutionCode.description: The code (or acronym) for the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

catalogNumber.name: Catalogue number
catalogNumber.count: {num, plural, one { catalogue number } other {# catalogue numbers}}
catalogNumber.description: The identifier for the record within a catalogue or collection.

mediaType.name: Media type
mediaType.count: {num, plural, one {media type} other {# media types}}
mediaType.description: The types of media accessible for this record.

occurrenceIssue.name: Issues and flags
occurrenceIssue.count: {num, plural, one {issue or flag} other {# issues and flags}}
occurrenceIssue.description: The types of issues or flags of potential interest discovered in processing the data.

occurrenceCountry.name: Country or area
occurrenceCountry.count: {num, plural, one {country or area} other {# countries or areas}}
occurrenceCountry.description: The country or territory where the event occurred

grsciCollCountry.description: Country or territory in the record's address

preparations.name: Preparations
preparations.description: How the specimen has been prepared (e.g. dried)

publishingCountryCode.name: Publishing country or area
publishingCountryCode.count: {num, plural, one {publishing country or area} other {# publishing countries or areas}}
publishingCountryCode.description: The ISO code for the country or territory in which the data publisher is located

q.name: Text search
q.count: {num, plural, one {text string} other {# search strings}}
q.description: Free text search across several fields

elevation.name: Elevation
elevation.count: {num, plural, one {elevation filter} other {# elevation filters}}
elevation.description: The distance above a vertical reference point (usually mean sea level or a geoid) in metres.

license.name: Licence
license.description: The legal licence or waiver under which the record is shared.

datasetKey.name: Dataset
datasetKey.description: The title of the dataset under which the record is shared.

datasetId.name: Dataset ID
datasetId.count: {num, plural, one {dataset ID} other {# dataset IDs}}
datasetId.description: The publisher's internal ID for the dataset that the record is associated with. Notice, that this is different from the datasetKey used on GBIF for the dataset.

publisherKey.name: Publisher
publisherKey.description: The name of the organization responsible for sharing the dataset in which the record is included.

gbifPublisherKey.name: GBIF publisher
gbifPublisherKey.count: {num, plural, one {GBIF publisher} other {# GBIF publishers}}
gbifPublisherKey.description: The name of the organization responsible for sharing the dataset in which the record is included.

hostingOrganizationKey.name: Hosting organization
hostingOrganizationKey.description: The name of the organization hosting the dataset in which the record is published.

country.name: Country or area
country.count: {num, plural, one {country or area} other {# countries or areas}}

countriesOfCoverage.name: Country or area of coverage
countriesOfCoverage.count: {num, plural, one {country or area of coverage} other {# countries or area of coverage}}
countriesOfCoverage.description: Which countries are covered by the record.

collectionDescriptorCountry.name: Country or area of coverage
collectionDescriptorCountry.count: {num, plural, one {country or area of coverage} other {# countries or area of coverage}}
collectionDescriptorCountry.description: Which countries does the collection have specimens from. Note that not all collections have this information filled.

countriesOfResearcher.name: Country or area of researcher
countriesOfResearcher.count: {num, plural, one {country or area of researcher} other {# countries or areas of researchers}}

typeStatus.name: Type status
typeStatus.count: {num, plural, one {type status} other {# type statuses}}
typeStatus.description: The type designation of a specimen.

year.name: Year
year.count: {num, plural, one {year filter} other {# year filters}}
year.description: The year in which the event occurred.

sampleSizeUnit.name: Sample size unit
sampleSizeUnit.count: {num, plural, one {sample size unit} other {# sample size units}}
sampleSizeUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the "sample size value".

coordinateUncertainty.name: Coordinate uncertainty
coordinateUncertainty.count: {num, plural, one {Coordinate uncertainty} other {# coordinate uncertainty filters}}
coordinateUncertainty.description: A measure of the minimum distance in metres from a coordinate within which a locality might be interpreted to be.

depth.name: Depth
depth.description: The distance below a local surface, in metres.

organismQuantity.name: Organism quantity
organismQuantity.count: {num, plural, one { organism quantity } other {# organism quantitys}}
organismQuantity.description: The value for the quantity of organisms, where the type of measurement is given in the "Organism quantity type".

sampleSizeValue.name: Sample size value
sampleSizeValue.count: {num, plural, one { sample size value } other {# sample size values}}
sampleSizeValue.description: The value for the size of a sample, where the units of measurement are given in the "Sample size unit".

relativeOrganismQuantity.name: Relative organism quantity
relativeOrganismQuantity.count: {num, plural, one { relative organism quantity } other {# relative organism quantities}}
relativeOrganismQuantity.description: The amount of biological material relative to the size of a sample, calculated as organismQuantity per sampleSize when the organismQuantityType and sampleSizeUnit are unambiguous.

month.name: Month
month.description: The integer month in which the event occurred.

continent.name: Continent
continent.description: The name of the continent in which the location occurs.  This field is not inferred but only populated if provided by the dataset publisher. Applying this filter may exclude relevant records.

protocol.name: Publishing protocol
protocol.description: The technical protocol through which the dataset is shared.

establishmentMeans.name: Establishment means
establishmentMeans.count: {num, plural, one { establishment means } other {# establishment means}}
establishmentMeans.description: The means by which the organism was introduced to a given place at a given time.

recordedBy.name: Recorded by
recordedBy.count: {num, plural, one { recorded by } other {# recorded bys}}
recordedBy.description: The names of the person, people, groups or organizations responsible for recording the original occurrence.

recordNumber.name: Record number
recordNumber.count: {num, plural, one { record number } other {# record numbers}}
recordNumber.description: An identifier given to the occurrence at the time it was recorded.

collectionCode.name: Collection code
collectionCode.count: {num, plural, one { collection code } other {# collection codes}}
collectionCode.description: What collection code is assigned to the record.

projectId.name: Project ID
projectId.count: {num, plural, one { project ID } other {# project IDs}}
projectId.description: What project ID is associated with the record.

recordedById.name: Recorded by ID
recordedById.count: {num, plural, one { recorded by ID } other {# recorded by IDs}}
recordedById.description: The identifier for the person, people, groups or organizations responsible for recording the original occurrence.

identifiedById.name: Identified by ID
identifiedById.count: {num, plural, one { identified by id } other {identified by #}}
identifiedById.description: The identifier for the person, people, groups or organizations responsible for determining the scientific name of the organism.

occurrenceId.name: Occurrence id
occurrenceId.count: {num, plural, one { occurrence ID } other {# occurrence IDs}}
occurrenceId.description: The unique identifier for the occurrence record.

organismId.name: Organism id
organismId.count: {num, plural, one { organism ID } other {# organism IDs}}
organismId.description: The unique identifier for the organism in the record.

locality.name: Locality
locality.description: The specific part of the description of the place.

waterBody.name: Water body
waterBody.count: {num, plural, one { water body } other {# water bodies}}
waterBody.description: The name of the water body in which the location occurs.

higherGeography.name: Higher geography
higherGeography.count: {num, plural, one { higher geography } other {# higher geographies}}
higherGeography.description: Higher geography in which the record is located. This is not an interpreted field, but the original data as provided by the publisher. Multiple values can be provided.

stateProvince.name: State province
stateProvince.count: {num, plural, one { state province } other {# state provinces}}
stateProvince.description: The name of the next administrative region smaller than country in which the location occurs.

eventId.name: Event ID
eventId.count: {num, plural, one { event ID } other {# event IDs}}
eventId.description: The unique identifier for the event in the record.

eventID.name: Event ID
eventID.count: {num, plural, one { event ID } other {# event IDs}}
eventID.description: The unique identifier for the event in the record.

parentEventId.name: Parent event ID
parentEventId.count: {num, plural, one { event ID } other {# event IDs}}
parentEventId.description: The unique identifier for the Parent Event in the record.

locationID.name: Location ID
locationID.count: {num, plural, one { event ID } other {# event IDs}}
locationID.description: The unique identifier for the site in the record.

measurementOrFactTypes.name: Measurement types
measurementOrFactTypes.count: {num, plural, one { measurement type } other {# measurement types}}

measurementOrFactCount.name: Measurement count
measurementOrFactCount.count: {num, plural, one { measurement count } other {# measurement counts}}
measurementOrFactCount.description: The count of a given measurement type.

occurrenceCount.name: Occurrence count
occurrenceCount.description: Number of occurrences for the event

eventType.name: Event type
eventType.count: {num, plural, one { event type } other {# event types}}
eventType.description: The type of the sampling event.

dataStructure.name: Structure
dataStructure.count: {num, plural, one { event type } other {# event types}}
dataStructure.description: The data structure for the sampling event.

samplingProtocol.name: Sampling protocol
samplingProtocol.count: {num, plural, one { sampling protocol } other {# sampling protocols}}
samplingProtocol.description: The name of, reference to or description of the method or protocol used during an event.

occurrenceStatus.name: Occurrence status
occurrenceStatus.count: {num, plural, one { occurrence status } other {# occurrence statuses}}
occurrenceStatus.description: The presence or absence of any organisms of the given taxon.

gadmGid.name: Administrative area
gadmGid.count: {num, plural, one { administrative area } other {# administrative areas}}
gadmGid.description: The name of any administrative area from GADM.org determined during record processing.

identifiedBy.name: Identified by
identifiedBy.count: {num, plural, one { Identified by } other {Identified by (#)}}
identifiedBy.description: The person, people, groups or organizations responsible for determining the scientific name of the Organism.

isInCluster.name: Has related records
isInCluster.description: This experimental feature highlights possible duplicate and/or related occurrences.

isSequenced.name: Is sequenced
isSequenced.count: {num, plural, one { Is sequenced } other {# Is sequenced}}
isSequenced.description: Whether the record has sequence information.

active.name: Active
active.description: Whether the entry corresponds to an active collection/institution or a historical listing that no longer exists.

activeInstitution.name: Active
activeInstitution.description: Whether the entry corresponds to an active institution or a historical listing that no longer exists.

activeCollection.name: Active
activeCollection.description: Whether the entry corresponds to an active collection or a historical listing that no longer exists.

publicationDate.name: Publication date
publicationDate.count: {num, plural, one { publication date } other {# publication dates}}
publicationDate.description: When was the record was published

datasetType.name: Dataset type
datasetType.count: {num, plural, one { dataset type } other {# dataset types}}
datasetType.description: A short description of the component should be placed here

datasetSubtype.name: Dataset subtype
datasetSubtype.count: {num, plural, one { dataset subtype } other {# dataset subtypes}}
datasetSubtype.description: A short description of the component should be placed here

institutionKey.name: Institution
institutionKey.description: The name of the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

city.name: City
city.description: City where the institution/collection can be found.

code.name: Code
code.description: The primary code that identifies the record as a whole. If you get no result, try the alternative code filter.

verbatimScientificName.name: Verbatim scientific name
verbatimScientificName.count: {num, plural, one { verbatim scientific name } other {# verbatim scientific names}}
verbatimScientificName.description: The scientific name as provided by the data publisher without any normalization.

networkKey.name: Network
networkKey.description: A short description of the component should be placed here

literatureType.name: Literature type
literatureType.count: {num, plural, one { literature type } other {# literature types}}
literatureType.description: What type of literature does the citation come from.

higherTaxonKey.name: Higher taxon
higherTaxonKey.count: {num, plural, one {higher taxon} other {# higher taxa}}
higherTaxonKey.description: A higher taxon to filter by.

issueEnum.name: Issues and flags
issueEnum.count: {num, plural, one {issue or flag} other {# issues and flags}}
issueEnum.description: The types of issues or flags of potential interest discovered in processing the data.
